Package Model

Class BlueCard

java.lang.Object
Model.Card
Model.ValueCard
Model.BlueCard
public class BlueCard
extends ValueCard
BlueCard is the class that contains the needed attributes and methods to implement the behavior of a blue card in the Thats Life! game. BlueCard is a child class of ValueCard
See Also:
Card, ValueCard

  • Constructor Details

    • BlueCard

      public BlueCard​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String career)
      The sole constructor for this class. Creates a blue card with the specified action name to be assigned to its super class and the specified career to it.
      Parameters:
      name - the name (action) of the blue card
      career - the specified career assigned to the blue card
